title: Whole-Task-Oriented Programming Learning Course for Real-World Problem Solving

context.additional_context: A Process Focused on Programming Learning for Solving Science-Related Problems in Digital Device-Provided Environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve problems using basic Python programming syntax (variables, conditionals, loops) through real scientific data analysis projects
Learners can decompose and integrate entire assignments (task-based learning strategy) step-by-step to develop practical programs
Learners can collaboratively design algorithms and perform debugging processes for scientific problem-solving with peers
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
